channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Hat -- openshift-service-mesh/kiali-rhel7-operator
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Hat -- openshift-service-mesh/kiali-rhel7-operator

item.title: CVE-2020-1704|2024-08-04T06:46:30.534Z -- red%20hat -- openshift-service-mesh%2Fkiali-rhel7-operator
item.description: An insecure modification vulnerability in the /etc/passwd file was found in all versions of OpenShift ServiceMesh (maistra) before 1.0.8 in the openshift/istio-kialia-rhel7-operator-container. An attacker with access to the container could use this flaw to modify /etc/passwd and escalate their privileges.
